about_the_game:
The chosen hero, under your leadership, tries to save the kingdom from the lord of the dark world. He fights enemies with the help of your judgment, experience, and ability to use chance to your advantage. Combine magic, artifacts, and brute force. Tacticize and seek the right path to victory!

FEATURES
  • No boring tutorial: Everything is connected, and you'll use your creative mind, experimentation, the in-game encyclopedia, and information obtained by right-clicking on everything to quickly uncover all you need to successfully progress through the game.
  • Dynamic deckbuilding: Reassemble your deck even during your run to prepare for specific situations and enemies. Add a newly found and played card to your deck right before the next room.
  • Permanent Map: Walk through the tiles one-by-one or teleport between portals using the knowledge you've gained about the position of enemies or other secret locations. Use campsites, merchants, or search for treasure.
  • Multiple uses for each card: Play your cards as they are intended, sacrifice them to gain the resources needed to play more cards, or play them using Cultic Items to change their effect.
  • Creative combos: You don't have to immediately pick up items found in a room. Leave them lying around and only collect them at the right time and in the right order. Activate combos to get extra items.
  • Five great heroes: Different heroes from different parts of the world who will use their strengths and weaknesses to fight evil. Each has a unique active and passive skill and a special card. For every run, choose a different one.
  • Upgrade Heroes and Cards: Invest the gems you collect and loot into upgrading your heroes. But, most importantly, focus on upgrading your cards. Find a lab on the map, and level up the cards there.
  • Discover Cultic Items and Artifacts: Find and use various items and use them passively or expand your card-playing options.

short_description: This is a hybrid between a card, board, and turn-based single-player game. Play cards in various ways, and discover iconic artifacts. Combine logical possibilities with an aspect of chance. Gradually map the world of this rogue-lite adventure. Walk through the portal and fight!
